Use handwritten letters: Write letters to your friends and family members on a regular basis to keep in touch. This will give you a chance to express your thoughts and feelings in a more personal way, and it will also give you a physical keepsake of your relationship.

Plan regular visits: Plan regular visits to your friends and family members, whether it's a weekend getaway or a longer trip. This will give you the opportunity to spend quality time with them and to catch up on their lives.
Join a club or group: Join a club or group that aligns with your interests or hobbies. This will give you the opportunity to meet new people and make new friends.
Volunteer: Volunteer for a cause that you care about. This will give you the opportunity to make a difference in the world and to meet like-minded individuals.

Use social media in moderation: While it's natural to feel jealous when you see others succeeding, it's important to remember that social media often presents a curated version of people's lives. Try to focus on your own accomplishments and to be kind to yourself.
